Seed!!!
Nice clean upload, thanks deamon2000, I loved this game on PS2. I use Xpadder to emulate the PS2 control set up, works well; thanks also to you guys/gals who continue to seed older torrents.

You have to extract the DeuxEx_GOTY_1.rar file and then mount DeuxEx_GOTY_1.img file in DT/Alcohol/other.

When mounting, next to the filename, don't forget to change option "All image files" (or similar) for option "All files" to be able to see the .img file in the extracted folder

1.2 MB/s ... I used all my connection speed ... download faster than I've ever done in my life...

Thank you so much !
